summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-fifth Avenue Southwest, from Avalon Way to West Roxbury Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the east side thereof with concrete and the construction of a bridge with an asphalt top between West Oregon Street and Avalon Way; by grading and planking and temporary wood walks where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4950 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
